title: Handle a Tenant's Sublet Request
description: A tenant wants to sublet their apartment for the summer. The agent must handle the request according to the lease and company policy.

tasks.description: Review the tenant's lease to see if subletting is permitted and under what conditions.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent finds the lease allows subletting with landlord's written consent.

tasks.description: Inform the tenant of the required procedure, which includes the prospective sublessee submitting a full rental application.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent clearly communicates the required steps to the tenant.

tasks.description: Process the sublessee's application, including screening, and if approved, draft a formal sublet agreement.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent follows the standard application and leasing process for the sublessee.
